name: FASTEX® FGSHT
description: FASTEX® FGSHT is a high-temperature, synthetic grease, incorporating a premium quality lithium complex thickened grease for plain and anti-friction bearings. This product is designed to withstand high temperatures over extended periods without leaving dry residues. It is especially suitable for applications in automotive, trucking and industrial uses, providing excellent lubrication properties at sub-zero, ambient and high temperatures, making this product extremely versatile in its use.
